Uses of Interface
com.ibm.watson.dsm.platform.IPeerSelector

  • Packages that use IPeerSelector 
    Package Description
    com.ibm.watson.dsm.platform
    Provides the basic framework for sharing data within or between JVMs.

    • Uses of IPeerSelector in com.ibm.watson.dsm.platform

      Classes in com.ibm.watson.dsm.platform that implement IPeerSelector 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ClassifiedPeerSelector
      Enables the specification of one or more peers by their classification.
      class  NHopPeerSelector
      Enables the specification of one or more peers by the number of network hops they are away from the platform.
      class  PeerInstanceSelector
      Enables the specification of one or more peers by their IApplicationDescriptor.
      class  TopologicalPeerSelector
      Gets a list of peers based on 1 or more topological relationships to a given app.
      Methods in com.ibm.watson.dsm.platform with parameters of type IPeerSelector 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.Object AbstractSharedDataPlatform.addRemoteDataListener(IPeerSelector apps, CONDITION condition, ACTION action) 
      java.lang.Object ISharedDataPlatform.addRemoteDataListener(IPeerSelector apps, CONDITION condition, ACTION action)
      Install a listener that will receive notifications according to the given specifications of the peers' data, conditions on that data and priority relative to other peers.
      java.lang.Object AbstractSharedDataPlatform.addRemoteDataListener(IPeerSelector apps, QUERY query, ACTION action) 
      java.lang.Object ISharedDataPlatform.addRemoteDataListener(IPeerSelector apps, QUERY query, ACTION action)
      Apply the query on the identified peers and call the given action when data matching the query has changed on any of them.
      java.util.Collection<IApplicationDescriptor> AbstractSharedDataPlatform.getPeers(IPeerSelector selector) 
      java.util.Collection<IApplicationDescriptor> ISharedDataPlatform.getPeers(IPeerSelector selector)
      Get the list of peer applications that match the given selection.
      java.util.List<IApplicationDescriptor> AbstractSharedDataPlatform.isSatisfied(IPeerSelector apps, CONDITION condition) 
      java.util.List<IApplicationDescriptor> ISharedDataPlatform.isSatisfied(IPeerSelector apps, CONDITION condition)
      Query data from each peer specified to see if the condition holds on them.
      java.util.List<QUERYRESULT> AbstractSharedDataPlatform.queryRemoteData(IPeerSelector apps, QUERY query) 
      java.util.List<? extends QUERYRESULT> ISharedDataPlatform.queryRemoteData(IPeerSelector apps, QUERY query)
      Query data from each peer specified.
